Hi there, 
I'm using JUnit 3.8.1 integrated to Ant in order to generate tes=
 
report as an HTML page(s) ...
I've failures rising when comparing french =
lables with accents.
even if the test is successfull, I've got a failure fr=
om Junit 
because of the accent conversion  :

effectu=C3=A9 expected:<...=
=C3=A9> but was:<...=E9>

could anyone tell me what I can do to avoid failu=
re rising of this 
type ...?

Cheers,

NicolaS.
